CREATE TABLE `cubsystem`.`pages` ( 
    `id`        INT     NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, 
    `title`     TEXT    NOT NULL,
    `context`   TEXT    NOT NULL,
    `link`      TEXT    NOT NULL,
    `views`     INT     NOT NULL,
    `author`    TEXT    NOT NULL,
    `tag`       TEXT    NOT NULL,
    `comments`  INT     NOT NULL,
PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;
